note_data.title: photography-gallery [Analysis]
note_data.content:
# photography-gallery

## Purpose
Client gallery system for delivering final photos with password protection, download options, and print ordering integration using Stripe payments.

## Business Context
**Type**: client-facing
**Category**: web-apps

## Original Location
`/Users/dave/Code/PhotoGallery2023`

## Project Metrics
- **Files**: 847
- **Size**: 45M
- **Last Modified**: 2024-11-15

## Tech Stack
laravel, vue, mysql, stripe, redis

## Git Information
- **Remote**: git@github.com:dave/photo-gallery.git
- **Branch**: main
- **Has uncommitted changes**: No

## Documentation Excerpt
```
# Photography Gallery

A modern Laravel application for managing and displaying photography portfolios.

## Features
- Image upload and management
- Client galleries with password protection
- Watermarking and image processing
- Responsive design for mobile viewing
- Stripe integration for print orders
```

project_data.name: backup-automation
project_data.description: Bash script for automated backup of photography files to external drives and cloud storage with incremental backup support and email notifications.

note_data.title: backup-automation [Analysis]
note_data.content:
# backup-automation

## Purpose
Bash script for automated backup of photography files to external drives and cloud storage with incremental backup support and email notifications.

## Business Context
**Type**: automation
**Category**: scripts

## Original Location
`/Users/dave/Scripts/backup_script`

## Project Metrics
- **Files**: 3
- **Size**: 24K
- **Last Modified**: 2024-10-20

## Tech Stack
bash

## Git Information
- No git repository

## Documentation Excerpt
```
#!/bin/bash
# Photography Backup Automation
# Backs up RAW files and exports to multiple destinations

# Configuration
SOURCE_DIR="/Volumes/Photography"
BACKUP_DRIVES=("/Volumes/Backup1" "/Volumes/Backup2")
CLOUD_DIR="~/Dropbox/PhotoBackups"
```
